# Skill: runbook-review

## Purpose
Perform a concise review before merge.

## Checklist
- Acceptance criteria met.
- Plan followed (or deviations logged).
- Artifacts referenced by key (no payload handoff).
- Diffs are minimal and scoped.
- Any ambiguity includes confidence + alternatives.

## Output
- Review notes with pass/fail per item.
- Follow-up actions, if any.
